name: S.H.I.R.O
description:
A virus has infected the machines in a secret military laboratory.  A secret organization wanting to stop the truth escaping.  An Engineer intent on exposing the truth. Escape the lab!

Additional Info:

Hi. I am a game hobbyist and this is only my second game I have made so it isn't perfect. I hope you enjoy it for what it is and would love some constructive feedback to help me with future projects!
